meanings.definition: To concentrate on and become an expert in a particular subject or skill.
meanings.sent3: The cat specialises in napping in sunbeams.
meanings.sent4: Her mind specialises in unraveling mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The detective specialises in solving complex cases.

meanings.definition: To be particularly good at or interested in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: He specialises in making people laugh.
meanings.sent2: She specialises in baking delicious cakes.
meanings.sent3: The clown specialises in juggling rubber chickens.
meanings.sent4: His heart specialises in spreading kindness.
meanings.sent5: The athlete specialises in breaking records.
